alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 8:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Gusty winds from thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, east central Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 846 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles southeast of Ennis to 26 miles south of Alder. Movement was east northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Jeffers, Big Sky, Cameron and Yellowstone Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
